existing_features.title: Update the WhatsApp deep-link prefilled text generated after a successful contact form submission so it includes every contact form field (name, email, phone, message) in a clear, copy/paste-friendly format for fast replies, and always targets the dedicated contact-form WhatsApp number from configuration (siteConfig.whatsapp.contactFormNumber).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update contact form submission so it sends a WhatsApp message to the provided number including all contact form details (client data) in the message text for quick replies

projectName: Improve WhatsApp prefilled message text from Contact form (include all client details)
